mapper.insert: insert into audio (user_id, question_id, file_path, upload_time) VALUES (#{userId},#{questionId},#{fileUrl},#{uploadTime})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, question_id, file_path as fileUrl, upload_time from audio where file_path = #{fileUrl};
